course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Photography
course.description: This course provides an overview of the various forms of Photography, explores the relationship between visual communication and art. The course will examine the collaborative process between light and graphic, concepts and skills. The increasing influences of images and trends from visual media will also be discussed.

reviews.author: hatsunemiku
reviews.title: Chill professor and also ur grade
reviews.comment_content:
The syllabus is very unclear and the assignment's instructions are very poor delivered.
Contents are barely relevant to photography, it has outing but he teaches nothing, just telling us to take photos, thats all.

Ah he also told us we can borrow a camera from school's library but it is only available for staff :)
reviews.comment_teaching: His teaching using Cantonese most of the times so that the international students won't understand. PowerPoint slides are messy and poor organised. His lecturers are really boring like 拖時間. He also got mad at someone didn't have a group member although they didn't want to.
reviews.comment_grading:
我派好少A range架咋
-- Chu Shun (2023)
reviews.comment_workload:
Very heavy and very intensive for a summer course
Having a midterm project right after the add drop period ends
